list.title: 基于抑制小神经胶质细胞活化的新型多靶点薯蓣皂苷元-二甲双胍缀合物的设计、合成及抗老年痴呆活性研究
list.alternativeTitle: Study on Design, Synthesis and Biological Evaluation of Novel Multi-target Diosgenin-Metformin Conjugates for Alzheimer's Disease Based on Inhibition of Microglial Activation
list.creator: 蔡邦荣;刘改枝;许杜娟;刘萌芽;王真真
list.creatOrorganization: 河南中医药大学;河南中医药大学;河南中医药大学;河南中医药大学;河南中医药大学
list.abstractCn: 阿尔茨海默症（AD）是目前全世界范围内严重威胁人类健康的疾病之一，发病机理复杂， 临床上尚无药可根治。脑内小胶质细胞活化介导的炎症被认为是老年痴呆症发生和发展的关键因素之一。我们前期研究发现对薯蓣皂苷元（DG）3位修饰能显著增强其抗炎活性及改善小鼠认知障碍。本项目以小胶质细胞为靶标，设计合成系列新型薯蓣皂苷元衍生物，改善其成药性并增强疗效。运用分子生物学、细胞生物学和神经行为学等技术探究薯蓣皂苷衍生物对脂多糖（LPS）诱导BV2细胞炎症反应、自组装成纳米粒后的抗肿瘤活性。为薯蓣皂苷元多靶点新药研发奠定基础并提供新思路和新方法。
list.keywordsCn: 分子修饰;天麻素;薯蓣皂苷元;神经炎症;老年痴呆
list.abstractEn: Alzheimer's Disease (AD) is one of the most serious diseases that threaten human health worldwide. The pathology of AD remains unknown and as yet, none of drugs are available to eradicate AD in clinic. Neuroinflammation mediated by microglia has been considered as a key factor in the occurrence and progression of AD, and our previous studies showed that the modification of diosgenin at C3-OH significantly enhanced its anti-neuroinflammatory effect and restored the learning and memory loss impaired by LPS in mice. We would like to further design, synthesize a series of novel DG conjugate to improve their druggability and therapeutic efficacy using microglia. In this regard, molecular biology, cell biology and neurobehavioral will have used to investigate the effects of DG conjugate on the LPS-induced neuroinflammation in BV2 cells and cognitive disorders APP/PS1 transgenic mice. Also we tested its anti-proliferative effect on tumor using self-assembled DG conjugate. It will pave a theoretical way for development of multi-target DG and providing a new idea and method.
list.projectSubjectName: 基于抑制小神经胶质细胞活化的新型多靶点薯蓣皂苷元-二甲双胍缀合物的设计、合成及抗老年痴呆活性研究
